name: AnablepSecurity
0:
”Alexa, open security cloud sensors”
”tell me about anablep security”
”thank you”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: security cloud sensors
des:
The smart home is made simpler than ever. 
You can easily check the status of your room or garage. You can see the latest feed of temperature, humidity, air quality, etc.
To start, you can say the commands below:
1. What is the temperature?
2. How is the Air Quality?
3. How is humidity?
4. What is the status of motion sensor?

To hear the sensor summary, say "Status of (Your device name)".

It collects your Amazon profile name and email to provide information via Account Linking to Customer Support about the cloud Sensors.
